properties.name: Vol. 6. Plate, R. [Map bound by Broadway, Middleton St., Harrison Ave., Flushing Ave., Lee Ave., Keap St.; Including Marcy Ave., Hooper St., Hewes St., Penn St., Rutledge St., Hayward St., Lynch St., Gwinnett St., Walton St., Wallabout St., Gerry St.]
properties.description: from Detailed estate and old farm line atlas of the city of Brooklyn : complete in six volumes ... from official records, private plans, and actual surveys ... / by G.M. Hopkins, C.E.
